replies.content: You are right the old internet of the 90s died. Same with the freedom and anonymous as well. Wish that web came back. It might through the distributed web/internet. It is are future
replies.author: Anonymous

replies.content: That's great. Both DAT and IPFS protocols have huge power to fuel data ownership thesis. I think @BeakerBrowser could be mentioned there as you can host your very own web page by yourself :) Also how to put your website on IPFS could be timeless guide :)

replies.content: Thank you very much! :) I’ll probably start following some steps about data collecting from other people and soon publish something about it. Let’s see. I’ve got some TODOs to start putting more effort on my own website instead of other social media. 😀
